title: Prime Evoke
details:
Prime Gives you to enjoy the comfort of a pristine space in a luxury spacious landscape in one of Colombo's most sort after suburbs .
for a price 7.5M this is going to be the next best family dwelling that makes the house truly valuable for money.

With 2 and 3 Bedroom houses
Including swimming pools , Kids play area , 24 hour security , gymnasium and car parks.
